subject: Paralympic Games
Cocaine and Crack Cocaine
lead_paragraph: Stefan Edberg will return to competitive tennis for the first time in 12 years with two matches on the senior tour. Edberg, 42, who won two Wimbledon titles among his six Grand Slam crowns, had declined to play seniors events but changed his mind when Pete Sampras announced he would play two events this year.
